title: Print, "Design for Cartouche with Large and Small Compartments", 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper center: 9me. Livre; upper right: I.; lower center, in the small compartment: MORCEAUX DE/CAPRICCES, PROPRE/A DIVERS USAGES; INVENTES/PAR FRACOIS CUVILLIES, PREMIER/ARCHITECTE DE S.A.S.E. DE BEVIERE./SE TROUVE CHEZ LAUTEUR; lower left: C.P.S.C.M.; lower center: Se vend aussi a Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St./Iacque a limage St. Benoit Avec Privilege du Roy.; lower right: grave par C.A. de Lespilliez/1.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: In the upper compartment, a young couple dancing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for Cartouche with Large and Small Compartments", 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-51.
